jonsan-nayikwist ghoshaya - wikipidiya, nidahas wishwakoshaya jonsan-nayikwist ghoshaya jonsan-nayikwist ghoshaya (thapaja ghoshaya, jonsan ghoshaya, ho nayikwist ghoshaya) yanu, yodannawu wolatiyathawaya kumak wuwath eyin swayaththawa athiwannawu ha, samathulithathawayehi pawathna widyuth sannayakayak thula aaropana wahaka wala (samanyayen ilektrona wala) thapaja kalambaanaya nisawen janitha wannawu widyuth ghoshayaki.
